name: The Captain is Dead (itch)
description:
Your captain is dead. Work to keep the ship together and charge the FTL to escape down to earth!

-- HAS TO BE PLAYED WITH A DEDICATED SERVER -- Server Build is in the Binaries folder 

Repair the ship as events happen

Find more items to help in the cargo bay

Complete the minigames to get buffs or fix problems on the ship

  • F - to interact with subsystems allowing you to control them
  • E- to pickup items
  • Q - to drop items
  • F1 to see controls and a Map in game
  • WASD - Movement
  • LMB - Used current item

The server sometimes crashes after the game and might need to be restarted between rounds

Used 1 Texture from 100Crosshair pack on the marketplace
Used 2Audio Loops from Abstrace Ambiences
Used 1 VFX from Advanced Magic and edited it for reuse
Used 1 Computer from the Dekogon Pack
Used Enforcer Rig from the marketplace for the AI
Used Footstep sound pack from Marketplace
Used MeleeWeapons from the marketplace
Used Anim Movement, Rifle, and Pistol from the marketplace
Used 2 Textures from the Pro Icon Pack
Used 4 Sounds from the Robotic Lifeforms Pack
Used 5 Textures from the SciFi Icons Pack, edited
Used the entire scifi_kitbask kit on the marketplace for the level, doors, and set dressing, edited
Used the ProtoType Weapon pack from the marketplace
Used 1 BP(Water World) from the Space_Essentials pack Edited
All voice over sounds I created, all gameplay code I created, most weapon FX I created or heavily edited

Hope you enjoyed the game
